titleStmt.title: The present state of England expressed in this paradox, our fathers were very rich with little, and wee poore with much. Written by Walter Cary.
titleStmt.author: Cary, Walter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Young for William Sheffard in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with imprint date 1627.
Reproduction of the original in the Columbia University Library.
